        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14759</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Le monete dell' euro </string>
            <string language="en">Euro Coins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Euro-Münzen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pièces d'euro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Moedas Euro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ευρο- νομίσματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Moneda del euro</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Un progetto interattivo per identificare i simboli delle monete dell'euro</string>
            <string language="en">An interactive project for identifying the symbols on the euro coins.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein interaktives Projekt für das Kennzeichnen 
der Symbole auf dem Euro prägt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un projet interactif pour identifier les symboles 
sur les pièces d'euro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um projeto interativo para identificar os 
símbolos nas moedas euro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα διαλογικό πρόγραμμα για τον προσδιορισμό των 
συμβόλων για τα ευρο- νομίσματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un proyecto interactivo para identificar los 
símbolos en la moneda del euro.</string>
          </description>
        </general>

            <string language="it">Gli alunni dimostreranno conoscenze sulle origini delle monete europee. Dovranno trascinare ogni moneta al posto giusto sulla mappa dell'europa.</string>
            <string language="en">Pupils will demonstrate knowledge of the origin of European coins. They will have to drag every coin to the proper place on the map of Europe.</string>
